title: FS: Lot of 19 raw Polar Bears including Bender - CLOSED

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of 19 raw Polar Bears including Bender - CLOSED
posts.post_content:
Looking to sell this lot of 19 Polar Bears. Cards vary in low grade condition but no loss and a few nuggets including a slight miscut back and a Bender and some key players.

Asking $[STRIKE]1100[/STRIKE] $995 for the lot.  Not wanting to break it up at this time.

I’m available via PM.

Thanks for looking!
Jeff
